dsgvo_description: GDPR consent for this chat. Commands: info, agree, refuse.
dsgvo_language_hint: üåê You can change the language for this chat with !language <de|en>.
dsgvo_text:
üìã *GDPR Information*
_Your data protection ‚Äì short & clear!_

üîπ *Controller:*
  NishiBot (Owner: Max Mustermann)

üîπ *Data types:*
  ‚Ä¢ Chat ID
  ‚Ä¢ Usage statistics (e.g. commands)

üîπ *Purpose of processing:*
  ‚Ä¢ Bot operation & functionality
  ‚Ä¢ Statistical analysis

üîπ *Rights of data subjects:*
  1. Information about stored data
  2. Correction of incorrect data
  3. Deletion (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù)
  4. Restriction of processing
  5. Objection to data processing
  6. Data portability

üîπ *Storage duration:*
  Data is deleted when no longer needed or upon request.

üîπ *Security:*
  ‚Ä¢ Encrypted transmission (TLS)
  ‚Ä¢ Servers in the EU, protected against unauthorized access

üîπ *Contact & complaints:*
  ‚Ä¢ E-Mail: sebloidl12@gmail.com

{language_hint}

_More details:_
`!dsgvo info`

not_registered: ‚ùå You are not registered yet. Use `!reg Name.Age` to register.
migrate_description: Migrates your old account to the new system.
migrate_private_only: Please run the registration in a private chat with the bot (no group chat).
migrate_info:
üì¶ *Migration of your old bot data*

If you used the bot before (before the big update), you can transfer your old data here.

*üîÑ How does it work?*
‚Ä¢ Just type *!migrate*
‚Ä¢ The bot searches for your old data (serial number)
‚Ä¢ If found, it will be imported into the new database

*‚ùóImportant:*
‚Ä¢ Only works via WhatsApp
‚Ä¢ If you are already registered, nothing will happen
‚Ä¢ Your old data will remain unchanged

Use *!migrate* now to import your old data.
migrate_only_whatsapp: ‚ùå This command only works via WhatsApp.
migrate_already_registered: ‚úÖ You are already registered in the new system.
migrate_no_data: ‚ùå No old data found under your serial number.
migrate_success: Migration complete! Your save key has been sent to you privately.
migrate_transfer_error: ‚ùå Error transferring data. Please contact support.

ping_tip: Tip: Network latency shows how fast your server reaches the internet. Bot reaction time is the time the bot needed to process. The speedtest measures your server's internet speed.

profile_description: Shows and edits your profile (name, birthday, picture, etc.)
profile_info:
üßæ *ME Profile ‚Äì Your personal profile*

üìå You can use the following commands:
üßë First name: *!me name Max*
üë§ Middle name: *!me zweitname Lukas*
üë® Last name: *!me nachname Schmidt*
üéÇ Birthday: *!me geb 18.05.2007*
üåç Region: *!me region Vienna*
üöª Gender: *!me geschlecht Male*
üí¨ Pronouns: *!me pronomen he/him*
üéØ Hobbies: *!me hobbys Reading, Drawing, Gaming*
üóëÔ∏è Delete picture: *!me bild delete*
‚ùå Delete: *!me delete name*, *!me delete all*
üñºÔ∏è Set profile picture: *!me bild* (send picture with command)
